attributes.action: push the EU to break the connection between gas price and oil price
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The EU has been responsible for the totally unnecessary rise in the gas price because it instituted the link between price per barrel of oil and the price of gas - yet there is not in reality ANY link between these two. How can this be allowed to go on? If the Prime Minister really wants to help with price rises this is the obvious place to start!
